snippet.textDisplay:
Sir, Kindly help me with this to remove the sprite after the sprite being played once. Did in corona and used texture packer for creating sprite sheet. 


local W = display.contentWidth
local H = display.contentHeight

-- -------------------
local background = display.newImageRect( "background.png", W, H )
background.x = display.contentCenterX
background.y = display.contentCenterY

-- ------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Calling balloonburstsprite.lua file
local objectSheet = require("balloonburstsprite")
local myObjectSheet = graphics.newImageSheet("image/balloonburstsprite.png", objectSheet:getSheet())


    local balloonBurst = display.newSprite(myObjectSheet, objectSheet:getSequenceData())
    balloonBurst.x = display.contentCenterX
    balloonBurst.y = display.contentCenterY

--burst balloon
    balloonBurst:setSequence("burst")
    balloonBurst:play()
snippet.textOriginal:
Sir, Kindly help me with this to remove the sprite after the sprite being played once. Did in corona and used texture packer for creating sprite sheet. 


local W = display.contentWidth
local H = display.contentHeight

-- -------------------
local background = display.newImageRect( "background.png", W, H )
background.x = display.contentCenterX
background.y = display.contentCenterY

-- ------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Calling balloonburstsprite.lua file
local objectSheet = require("balloonburstsprite")
local myObjectSheet = graphics.newImageSheet("image/balloonburstsprite.png", objectSheet:getSheet())


    local balloonBurst = display.newSprite(myObjectSheet, objectSheet:getSequenceData())
    balloonBurst.x = display.contentCenterX
    balloonBurst.y = display.contentCenterY

--burst balloon
    balloonBurst:setSequence("burst")
    balloonBurst:play()

snippet.textDisplay: I would suggest using the sprite listener to call a function that either removes the balloon or turns it's alpha to 0: https://docs.coronalabs.com/guide/media/spriteAnimation/index.html
